meanings.sent1: She was manducating a delicious sandwich for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The hungry squirrel was manducating on a nut it found.
meanings.sent3: The manducating contest at the fair was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The old man's mind was manducating on memories of his youth.
meanings.sent5: The sound of manducating echoed through the dining hall.

meanings.definition: The act of consuming food by chewing.
meanings.sent1: Manducating is an essential part of the digestive process.
meanings.sent2: The loud manducating of the cows could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent3: The manducating of popcorn at the movies always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: The manducating of knowledge in class helps students grow.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic manducating of the horses in the barn was calming.
